Description:
Primary Duties and Responsibilities:Responsible for overseeing all engineering aspects of LNG Storage Tanks with the EPC Contractor including design, materials, equipment, fabrication, and execution. Ensures all technical requirements such as tank specifications, data sheets, design, and construction procedures, etc. developed during EPC fully comply with project requirements and EPC schedules.
Provide clear guidance to the EPC contractor and facilitate resolution of all technical issues associated with the LNG tanks design and construction to meet project objectives and milestones.
Provides engineering knowledge, design, quality assurance, leadership and expertise on LNG tanks while supervising EPC Contractor’s design in accordance with design specifications, industry standards, project procedures and requirements.
